com.paypal.selion.platform.grid

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.platform.grid.Grid

  • public final class Grid
extends Object
    Utility class making it easy to write tests based on Selenium WebDriver in a multi-thread context.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver() 
      static long getExecutionTimeoutValue() 
      static MobileTestSession getMobileTestSession() 
      static AbstractTestSession getTestSession() 
      static WebTestSession getWebTestSession() 
      static void open(String url)
      Helper method to load a URL in a browser.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getExecutionTimeoutValue

        public static long getExecutionTimeoutValue()
        Returns:
        The configured Config.ConfigProperty.EXECUTION_TIMEOUT for the current session.

      • driver

        public static org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver()
        Returns:
        A RemoteWebDriver object which can be used in the case of MobileTest and WebTests

      • getTestSession

        public static AbstractTestSession getTestSession()
        Returns:
        A AbstractTestSession object that represents the basic configurations for the currently running @WebTest/@MobileTest annotated method.

      • getMobileTestSession

        public static MobileTestSession getMobileTestSession()
        Returns:
        A MobileTestSession object that represents the App configurations for the currently running @MobileTest annotated method.

      • getWebTestSession

        public static WebTestSession getWebTestSession()
        Returns:
        A WebTestSession object that represents the Web configurations for the currently running @WebTest annotated method.

      • open

        public static void open(String url)
        Helper method to load a URL in a browser. Can be used for browsers in the case of WebTest and MobileTest
        Parameters:
        url - The url of the web application that needs to be opened.
